description.value:
Whenever you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Devise a Stratagem]{Devise a Strategem}, you can also attempt a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Arcana)]{Recall Knowledge} as part of that action. If you critically succeed at the Recall Knowledge check, you notice a weakness and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll from Devise a Stratagem.

If you immediately convey this information to your allies as part of the check, each ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Known Weakness]{Effect: Known Weakness}

rules.label: Known Weakness (critically succeeded on Recall Knowledge)
